message: ...What?
I... can't move.
I can't even wiggle my fingers, let alone my neck or my legs.
It's almost like... I'm buried in mud.
I try to scream, but I can't make a sound.
Even when I open my mouth, the only thing that comes out is air.
There's nothing but darkness around me. I have no idea where I am.
But I'm sure of one thing. That I can't stay here.
I need to get out of here. Fast.
The more I struggle, the deeper I sink. But I have to try.
There's no time... No time...
...What?
All of a sudden, I feel a tug on my right arm.
I turn to look. My right arm is floating, pale against the inky blackness.
But beyond my elbow... <k>there's nothing.
The lower half of my arm has vanished, as though something gobbled it up.
The darkness writhes, lapping at the stump窶鰭ungry, craving more.
I scream.
Though I can't make a sound, I scream.
Ah!
Ahhhh!
Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!!!!!!!!!!!!!
